name: Do I smell Pizza?
description:
The pizza arrived but Chubboy DOESN'T SHARE FOOD! The delivery noise wakes your food junky uninvited family and cheese sniffing rats! Throw extremely healthy food to nauseate your family. Spit on the rats do dissolve them. Go fast or get eaten in this FOOD HELL SHOOTER Tower Defense.

With a brand new top-down tower defense mechanics we present Do I smell pizza? You can place and after a time get again your tower to replace it in a better strategical point in the map. Playing as a person who has to dodge the enemies, the rats and also your own towers projectiles to survive. Your towers fight the uninvited family while you fight the rats. Chubboy can also eat a slice of food to replenish his health a point. Try this brand new mechanics developed by our team and give us your feedback on how to improve the gameplay.

Game Characteristics:

- Classic top-down action with all the modern improvements.

- Well-adjusted 2D controls. Dodge, attack and place towers while facing challenges.

- Collect coins and evolve your towers.

- A cast of cute and scary characters revived in traditional pixel art animations frame by frame.

- Beautiful pixel art rooms.
